org.apache.ignite.ml.optimization.updatecalculators

Interface ParameterUpdateCalculator<M,P extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - Type of model to be updated.
    P - Type of parameters needed for this update calculator.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NesterovUpdateCalculator, RPropUpdateCalculator, SimpleGDUpdateCalculator

    public interface ParameterUpdateCalculator<M,P extends Serializable>
extends Serializable
    Interface for classes encapsulating parameters updateCache logic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      P calculateNewUpdate(M mdl, P updaterParameters, int iteration, Matrix inputs, Matrix groundTruth)
      Calculate new update.
      P init(M mdl, IgniteFunction<Vector,IgniteDifferentiableVectorToDoubleFunction> loss)
      Initializes the update calculator.
      <M1 extends M>
      M1      		 update(M1 obj, P update)
      Update given obj with this parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        P init(M mdl,
       IgniteFunction<Vector,IgniteDifferentiableVectorToDoubleFunction> loss)
        Initializes the update calculator.
        Parameters:
        mdl - Model to be trained.
        loss - Loss function.
        Returns:
        Initialized parameters.

      • calculateNewUpdate

        P calculateNewUpdate(M mdl,
                     P updaterParameters,
                     int iteration,
                     Matrix inputs,
                     Matrix groundTruth)
        Calculate new update.
        Parameters:
        mdl - Model to be updated.
        updaterParameters - Updater parameters to updateCache.
        iteration - Current trainer iteration.
        inputs - Inputs.
        groundTruth - True values.
        Returns:
        Updated parameters.

      • update

        <M1 extends M> M1 update(M1 obj,
                         P update)
        Update given obj with this parameters.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be updated.
